string-array.name: hints_text
string-array.item: Explore the application! In every list long press an item to access the item based menu or click the menu button of your device to see a list menu. To search foods or menus in a list start typing or click the search button of your device!
You can see and update your info in the \"User Info\" tab
You can see a track of your diet in the \"General\" tab, also you can explore the foods and menus
The tab "Diet" shows you the general info about your diet today
You can replace a food when you are entring the meal data, just long press the food and select replace
Keep your weight updated, go to \"User Info\" tab and click on \"Edit Info\" button
To activate/deactivate the alarms click on the menu button of your device and click on Preferences
You can activate/deactivate this hints: go to Preferences or click the checkbox below
The planning of your diet is accessible through menu/Planning, there you can set default menus for your meals

If you think you had configured your diet with wrong data (about your personal info or usual wake/sleep time), don\'t worry, go to \"User Info\" tab and click on \"Edit Info\"(\"Edit Times\") button then enter the correct data. Now press menu and click on \"Reset Diet\".
